basic.description: For detailed information, consult the Department.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Topics in Renaissance Literature I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite   (ENGL200 and ENGL290) and (A GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from ENGL323; ENGL328; ENGL421; ENGL422
